TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AnimationExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: These extension methods perform animation on UIElements
Provides an extension which allows lighting.
A partial for the AnimationExtension which includes saturation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsBlurSupported { get; }
.property bool IsBlurSupported

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the platform supports blur.
Docs.remarks: A check should always be made to IsBlurSupported prior to calling Blur, since older operating systems will not support blurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsLightingSupported { get; }
.property bool IsLightingSupported

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is lighting supported.
Docs.value: true if this instance is lighting supported; otherwise, false.
